txt.en: Combustion creates a Molten Rune-stone where it lands.
Imperfect Umbari Armour of the Hungering Inferno\n(Max Level: 154)
Fiery Ridicule has no induction and can be used while moving.
Fire skills can proc the Hoarfire cycle (20% chance, 20s CD). Frost skills inflict bonus damage with no induction and Fire skills inflict bonus damage while the two are alternated.
